branchCategory.name: LFE, 3-color Display, Electromagnetic Type Digital Flow Switch
branchCategory.description: <p>SMC's LFE electromagnetic digital flow switch is compact and lightweight.&nbsp; As there are no obstacles or moving parts in the fluid path, the LFE is resistant to clogging.&nbsp; This design only allows a small pressure loss, and a reduced load to the pump, which saves energy.&nbsp; A 3-color, 2-screen indicator is used for better visibility.&nbsp; Instantaneous flow rate is displayed in the upper screen, set values, accumulated flow, peak/bottom value, and line names can be set&nbsp;to display in&nbsp;the lower screen.</p> <p>Options 4, 5, 6 7 in the configurator below are not SI units and are not for use in Japan due to new measurement law.</p>
